# TokenDrop.getDelegation() method

Get your voting delegatee address

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDelegation(): Promise<Address>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Address](./sdk.address.md)&gt;

the address of your vote delegatee
